name: Matthew O'Shaughnessy
tagline: Electrical Engineering, Georgia Institute of Technology
body:
# Welcome!

### Georgia Tech Registration Alerts
The only thing more competitive than classes at Georgia Tech is registering for those classes. I wrote this command-line program to automatically check the registration webpage and send me text message alerts when a seat in a class I need has opened up.
* Source: [link](google.com)
* Languages: Java, MATLAB (network latency visualization), [jsoup](jsoup.org) and [google-voice-java](https://code.google.com/p/google-voice-java/) libraries

### Motion-Controlled RC Helicopter
[This $20 RC Helicopter](http://www.amazon.com/Syma-S107-S107G-Helicopter-Red/dp/B004A8ZRBA/ref=sr_1_5?ie=UTF8&qid=1399236923&sr=8-5) is pretty cool, but the RC controller it shipped with is hard to use. Using an arduino programmed with C and AVR assembly and an IR LED, I created a new controller that uses tilt controls to fly the helicopter.
* Source and project details: [link](google.com)
* Languages: C, AVR Assembly, MATLAB/Simulink (testing/debugging)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
